data.convo: We are through . Why ? Why ? Isn't it obvious ? First you impose way too much on me , and I'm tired away . Second , you stood me up on the Valentine's Day . I'm very sorry for that , but I sent you several messages to explain , my mom was seriously ill , and I had to look afer her . But I ended up with finding out lady that night , that you were with other girl at cafe near your home . That girl was my cousin . You've got so many cousins . I called you later that night . But you didn't have the guts to answer the phone . I didn't take my cellphone with me at that time . I don't buy a story . I know you don't hear me right know , please calm down . Anyway , I don't wanna part . I'll drop by tomorrow . No , don't , I don't want to see you anymore . Don't ever call me again .
